howtoenableapp: Enable the app using the admin dashboard.
selectDefaultProductPage: At the top of the page, select the default product page.
selectAreaToDisplayAppBlock: Then, using the left panel, select the area to display the app block.
clickAddApp: Click add (+) to select Fast Checkout App.
enable_app_from_admin: You must enable the app from the admin dashboard, otherwise the Checkout button will not appear in the editor menu and the theme.
toEnableAppEmbedExtension: To enable the app embed extension, please
noteIfYouWantToAddBuyNow: Note: If you want to add the "Buy Now" button on the collection or home page, please send us an email at info.helpify24@gmail.com and we will set it up for you.
noteItWillShowYouStickyButton: Note: It will show you a sticky button at the bottom of the product page when you scroll down.
noteByEnablingShopifyDefault: Note: By enabling, the default Shopify Buy Now button will be hidden.
noteByEnablingAddToCart: Note: By enabling, the Add To Cart button will be hidden.
changethelocation: Note: If you want to change the location of the buy button on the product page, please add the code below to your file or let us know.
personalizeButtonAppearance: To personalize the button's appearance, navigate to the Fast Checkout dashboard within the Shopify admin panel. Here you can:
editButtonText: Edit the text displayed on the button to clearly communicate its function (e.g., "Buy Now", "Go to Checkout").
chooseColorFont: Choose a color and font style that complements your store's theme and makes the button stand out.
buttonAutomaticAppearance: Once set up, the button will automatically appear on all your product pages. When a customer clicks on the button for a specific product, they will be directed to the checkout page with that product already added to their cart, allowing for a quicker and more convenient shopping experience.
buttonFunctionalityDefault: This button functionality applies to all your product pages by default. You can contact our support team if you wish to discuss excluding specific products.
fastCheckoutSeamlessIntegration: Fast Checkout works seamlessly with your existing Shopify checkout process. No additional setup is required for checkout functionality.
supportContactInfo: If you have any questions or encounter issues using Fast Checkout, please refer to our documentation or contact our support team via info.helpify24@gmail.com.
howToAddAppBlock: How to add an App-block in theme pages?
